オプション1: A week had passed since Star Man and the others moved to the DirectNex coastal cave.

Thanks to the knowledge they'd accumulated so far, their life quickly stabilized.
Once they had a little breathing room,
Star Man decided to go see the ruins of Precision.

The goal was to recover weapons and tools,
but in truth those could be remade, so there was no need to retrieve them.
What Star Man really wanted was to see what had become of their former home.
